TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit AsyncResult extends System.Object implements class System.IAsyncResult, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink

type AsyncResult = class interface IAsyncResult interface IMessageSink

summary.span: 封装对委托的异步操作的结果。

span.span: Encapsulates the results of an asynchronous operation on a delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与使用委托进行的异步方法调用结合使用。The class is used in conjunction with asynchronous method calls made using delegates. 从委托的`BeginInvoke`方法返回的可以强制转换为。The returned from the delegate's `BeginInvoke` method can be cast to an . 具有属性,该属性保存在其上调用异步调用的委托对象。The has the property that holds the delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked. 有关使用委托的`BeginInvoke`和异步调用的详细信息, 请参阅[使用委托进行异步编程](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md)。For more information about `BeginInvoke` and asynchronous calls using delegates, see [Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性获取, 并演示如何等待异步调用委托。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 该示例由两个类组成, 该类包含异步调用的方法, 以及包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关使用委托异步调用方法的详细信息和示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

related.span: 使用委托进行异步编程

span.span: Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AsyncDelegate As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ AsyncDelegate { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在其上调用异步调用的委托对象。

span.span: Gets the delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.

value.span: 在其上调用异步调用的委托对象。

span.span: The delegate object on which the asynchronous call was invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以转换为用户定义的委托的实际类。The property can be cast to the actual class of the user-defined delegate. 例如, 如果用于进行异步调用的委托的类型`MyDelegate`为, 则必须将此属性返回的委托强制转换为。 `MyDelegate`For example, if the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous call is of type `MyDelegate`, the delegate that is returned by this property must be cast to `MyDelegate`. 然后, 回调方法可以调用委托的`EndInvoke`方法和正确的签名, 以获取异步方法调用的结果。The callback method can then call the delegate's `EndInvoke` method with the correct signature, in order to obtain the results of the asynchronous method call. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性获取用于进行异步调用的委托, 以便调用。 `EndInvoke`The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous call, in order to call `EndInvoke`. 该示例将作为回调方法的唯一参数转换为对象。The example casts the , which is the only parameter of the callback method, to an object. 该示例由两个类组成, 该类包含异步调用的方法, 以及包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关此回调示例工作方式的详细信息, 以及使用委托异步调用方法的更多示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information on the way this callback example works, and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/callback.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/callback.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/callback.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl AsyncProcessMessage(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage msg, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink replySink) cil managed
Public Overridable Function AsyncProcessMessage (msg As IMessage, replySink As IMessageSink) As IMessageCtrl

span.span: The request interface.
The response interface.
Implements the interface.
No value is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口的方法与类无关。 The method of the interface is not relevant to the class. 实现方式 引发。Implementation by throws a . 相反, 通过强制转换使用委托发出的异步调用返回的接口来获取。Instead, obtain an by casting the interface returned by an asynchronous call made using a delegate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AsyncState As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ AsyncState { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取作为 方法调用的最后一个参数而提供的对象。

span.span: Gets the object provided as the last parameter of a method call.

value.span: 作为 方法调用的最后一个参数而提供的对象。

span.span: The object provided as the last parameter of a method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关`BeginInvoke`方法的详细信息, 请参阅[使用委托进行异步编程](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md)。For more information about the `BeginInvoke` method, see [Asynchronous Programming Using Delegates](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-using-delegates.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将信息传递给回调方法。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used to pass information to a callback method. `BeginInvoke`方法调用的最后一个参数是一个格式字符串, 回调方法使用它来设置输出消息的格式。The last parameter of the `BeginInvoke` method call is a format string, which the callback method uses to format an output message. 该示例由两个类组成, 该类包含异步调用的方法, 以及包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关此回调示例工作方式的详细信息, 以及使用委托异步调用方法的更多示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information on the way this callback example works, and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/callback.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/callback.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/callback.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AsyncWaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: virtual property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ AsyncWaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取封装 Win32 同步句柄并允许实现各种同步方案的 。

span.span: Gets a that encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and allows the implementation of various synchronization schemes.

value.span: 封装 Win32 同步句柄并允许实现各种同步方案的 。

span.span: A that encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and allows the implementation of various synchronization schemes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步操作完成后, 此方法返回的将自动发出信号。The returned by this method is automatically signaled when the asynchronous operation has completed. 当你在用于进行异步方法调用的委托`EndInvoke`上调用时, 不会自动关闭等待句柄。The wait handle is not closed automatically when you call `EndInvoke` on the delegate that was used to make the asynchronous method call. 如果释放对等待句柄的所有引用，则当垃圾回收功能回收此等待句柄时将释放系统资源。If you release all references to the wait handle, system resources are freed when garbage collection reclaims the wait handle. 若要在使用完等待句柄后立即释放系统资源, 请调用方法。To free the system resources as soon as you are finished using the wait handle, call the method. 当显式关闭或释放可释放对象时, 垃圾回收的工作效率更高。Garbage collection works more efficiently when disposable objects are explicitly closed or disposed. > [!CAUTION] > 属性中包含的可用于阻止当前线程, 直到异步调用完成。 The contained in the property can be used to block the current thread until the asynchronous call is complete. 但是, 如果在`BeginInvoke`调用期间指定了一个, 则将忽略。 However the will ignore the , if one was specified during the `BeginInvoke` call. 因此, 当应用程序在完成执行前关闭, 即使在异步调用完成之前一直用到, 也会出现这种情况。Therefore, a situation can occur where the application shuts down before the has finished executing, even if a is used to block until the asynchronous call completion. 有关这种情况的示例, 请参阅类的示例并删除该语句。For an example of such a situation, see the example for the class, and remove the statement. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性获取, 并演示如何等待异步调用委托。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 该示例由两个类组成, 该类包含异步调用的方法, 以及包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关使用委托异步调用方法的详细信息和示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 调用是否同步完成。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the call completed synchronously.

value.span: 如果 调用同步完成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the call completed synchronously; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果检测到`BeginInvoke`调用在委托中同步完成, 则调用 BeginInvoke 的线程可能是当前线程。If it is detected that the `BeginInvoke` call completed synchronously in the delegate, it is probable that the thread that called BeginInvoke is the current thread. 接口的大多数提供程序将不使用此功能, 并将返回默认`false`值。Most providers of the interface will not use the capability and will return a default `false`. 的当前实现始终返回`false`。Current implementation of always returns `false`.

summary.span: 获取异步调用的响应消息。

span.span: Gets the response message for the asynchronous call.

returns.span: 一条远程处理消息，表示对远程对象上的方法调用的响应。

span.span: A remoting message that should represent a response to a method call on a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以在调用方法后返回对象。 The method can return an object after the method is called. 返回值可以转换为。 The return value can be cast to an . 但是, 不需要直接调用这些方法中的任何一个。However, you do not need to call either of these methods directly. 它们旨在供 .NET Framework 的远程处理基础结构使用。They are intended for use by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsCompleted As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsCompleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示服务器是否已完成该调用。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the server has completed the call.

value.span: 服务器完成该调用后，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: after the server has completed the call; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将属性设置为`true`之后, 服务器不能使用在议定的共享语义之外的任何客户端提供的资源。The server must not use any client supplied resources outside of the agreed upon sharing semantics after it sets the property to `true`. 因此, 客户端在属性返回`true`后销毁资源是安全的。Thus, it is safe for the client to destroy the resources after the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用返回`BeginInvoke`的的属性来发现异步调用何时完成。The following example shows how to use the property of the returned by `BeginInvoke` to discover when an asynchronous call completes. 从服务于用户界面的线程执行异步调用时需要执行此操作。You might do this when making the asynchronous call from a thread that services the user interface. 对完成情况进行轮询允许在 线程中执行异步调用时继续执行调用线程。Polling for completion allows the calling thread to continue executing while the asynchronous call executes on a thread. 该示例由两个类组成, 该类包含异步调用的方法, 以及包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes, the class that contains the method which is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关使用委托异步调用方法的详细信息和示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/polling.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/polling.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/polling.vb#4)]

Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现接口。The method implements the interface. 不需要直接调用此方法。You do not need to call this method directly. 它旨在供 .NET Framework 的远程处理基础结构使用。It is intended for use by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework. 调用使用者代码的委托。 invokes the consumer code's delegate. 它还设置方法返回的实例。It also sets the instance returned by the method. 如果参数的类型为, 则返回相同的对象。 `msg`If the `msg` parameter is of type , the same object is returned by . 否则, 将返回包含远程处理异常的答复消息。Otherwise, a reply message that contains a remoting exception is returned. 还将修改由属性返回的值。 also modifies the value returned by the property.
